description: The Begonia semperflorens 'Senator Deep Rose' is a show stopping variety of houseplant. With its beautiful green and deep rose foliage, and its unique fan-like growth habit, it stands out from the crowd. The flowers are free-flowering and come in a variety of colors, from bright pink to deep yellow, giving it a lovely, vibrant display all year round. The Begonia semperflorens 'Senator Deep Rose' is perfect for brightening up your office or home decor and is also easy to care for, making it an excellent choice for any home or garden.
